content: I don't have the capability to watch movies or tv shows. however, i'm aware that there have been many movies, tv shows, and books based on the trojan war and its heroes. some of the most famous adaptations include the movie "troy" starring brad pitt, the book "the iliad" by homer, and the video game "assassin's creed odyssey". the stories of the trojan war and its heroes continue to inspire writers, filmmakers, and artists today.
